title: 00_all
section: A quick car plot to verify rendering works
text:
A quick car plot to verify rendering works

ggplot(data = cars,
       mapping = aes(x = speed,
                     y = dist)) +
  geom_point(color = "red") +
  geom_smooth(color = "blue", method = "lm", se = F) +
  theme_minimal(base_size = 14)

`geom_smooth()` using formula = 'y ~ x'
